text: Bigu: «Bijoed on ciro, ki Parvardigoraton ʙar sumo harom kardaast, ʙarojaton ʙixonam: In ki cizero ʙo U sarik qaror nadihed va ʙa padaru modar neki kuned va farzandoni xudro az [tarsi] tangdasti nakused. Mo ʙa sumo va onon ruzi medihem va ʙa korhoi zist, ci oskor va ci nihon, nazdik nasaved va kasero, ki Alloh taolo [qatlasro] harom kardaast cuz ʙa haq nakused. In ast [on ci Alloh taolo] sumoro ʙa [pajravi az] on suporis kardaast, ʙosad, ki ʙiandesed
